channel.title: Changing bank interface text!
channel.description:
How do I add this code in?
sendFrame126("@dre@FuryScape", 2458); // Logout sendFrame126("@ora@Withdraw as:", 5388); // Withdraw As: sendFrame126("@ora@Insert", 8132); // Insert sendFrame126("@ora@Swap", 8133); // Swap sendFrame126("@ora@Item", 5389); // Item sendFrame126("@ora@Close Window", 5384); // Close Window sendFrame126("@ora@Rearrange mode:", 5390); // Rearrange mode: sendFrame126("@ora@Note", 5391); // Note sendFrame126("@ora@Bank Account of " + playerName, 5383); // The Bank of RuneScape

item.title: Changing bank interface text!

item.description:

um naw, I added it under update(), it works there, not where you said, but thanks for trying to help…

item.title: Changing bank interface text!

item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

You just keep posting threads. Make sure you use the search button first and google is always handy.

This should be a last resort.[/quote]just help them …

search for sendFrame126(" in client.java place it under or above another Send frame tada …

item.title: Changing bank interface text!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

How do I add this code in?

sendFrame126("@dre@FuryScape", 2458); // Logout
sendFrame126("@ora@Withdraw as:", 5388); // Withdraw As:
sendFrame126("@ora@Insert", 8132); // Insert
sendFrame126("@ora@Swap", 8133); // Swap
sendFrame126("@ora@Item", 5389); // Item
sendFrame126("@ora@Close Window", 5384); // Close Window
sendFrame126("@ora@Rearrange mode:", 5390); // Rearrange mode:
sendFrame126("@ora@Note", 5391); // Note
sendFrame126("@ora@Bank Account of " + playerName, 5383); // The Bank of RuneScape

Read full topic
